tweets.content:
```json [ "1/5 Ever wonder *why* a prediction model makes a certain guess. 🤔 It's not magic. But understanding *how* is tricky. 
━━━
. I dug into a cool paper that breaks it down. You won't believe the \"aha. \" moments. ✨ Check this out: https://mani2106

hook_variations: Alright, buckle up, internet friends! 🚀  This is gonna be SO cool!  I've been diving deep into this paper, "Explaining prediction models and individual predictions," and let me tell ya, it's a whole new world! ✨

We're talking about how to actually *see* what makes a model tick, not just guess. And guess what? I figured out how to implement it! 🤯 It's like getting a peek behind the curtain of those fancy algorithms.

So, I've put together a little something for you. A Twitter thread! 🎉 It's gonna break down how to take this awesome idea and actually *use* it. We'll go through the code, the data, the whole shebang. Get ready to have your mind blown! 💥
